name: Bloody Kirby
description: Don’t let the Bloody Mary steal all of the limelight.
ingredients: 1 1⁄2 oz Grey Goose Le Citron vodka
directions: In a shaker, muddle the vodka, cucumber, Tabasco, and vermouth.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Top with the tomato juice and garnish with a Kirby cucumber spear.
